template.name: GetOrder
template.query: SELECT NO_O_ID FROM new_order WHERE NO_D_ID = ? OR NO_D_ID = ? ORDER BY NO_O_ID ASC

template.name: GetCust
template.query: SELECT C_DISCOUNT, C_LAST, C_CREDIT FROM customer WHERE C_W_ID = ?

template.name: GetWarehouse
template.query: SELECT * FROM warehouse WHERE W_STREET_1 LIKE ?
